mapper.select: select * from cmt_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into cmt_board (bno, title, content, writer, viewcnt) values(seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{viewcnt})
mapper.update: update cmt_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, regdate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
